scripts.build:dev: npm install && napi build --features testing_utilities --platform --js ../src/native.js --dts ../src/native.d.ts --js-package-name @valkey/valkey-glide --pipe "prettier -w" $npm_config_build_flags && npm run postbuild:copy-node
scripts.build:benchmark: npm install && napi build --release --features testing_utilities --platform --js ../src/native.js --dts ../src/native.d.ts --js-package-name @valkey/valkey-glide --pipe "prettier -w" $npm_config_build_flags && npm run postbuild:copy-node
scripts.build:release: npm install && napi build --release --strip --platform --js ../src/native.js --dts ../src/native.d.ts --js-package-name @valkey/valkey-glide --pipe "prettier -w" $npm_config_build_flags && npm run postbuild:copy-node
scripts.format: npm run format:prettier && npm run format:rs
